meanings.definition: A written description or account of something.
meanings.sent1: I read a writeup about the new movie in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write a writeup about our summer vacation.
meanings.sent3: The writeup about the cat's adventures was so funny!
meanings.sent4: Her writeup of the storm was as vivid as a painting.
meanings.sent5: The writeup of the treasure hunt made me feel like I was there.

meanings.definition: The act of writing something, typically a report or article.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys the writeup process of creating stories.
meanings.sent2: The journalist's writeup of the event was published in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The writeup of the race was full of excitement and drama.
meanings.sent4: His writeup of the concert was like a symphony of words.
meanings.sent5: The writeup of the experiment made the scientific process clear to everyone.
